title: Singer Light Skin Tone
description: A microphone, representing a singer, with a light skin tone. Used to denote singing, performing, or vocal talent, often with a specific skin tone emphasis.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the singer emoji with a light skin tone is a dynamic portrayal of an artist mid-performance, wearing a stylish outfit and holding a microphone with a confident, expressive stance.  The glossy finish and dynamic lighting on Apple devices capture the energy and passion of a live show, perfect for celebrating musical talent, attending concerts, or sharing excitement about a performance.
